creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. M. Skinner in memory of her mother, Mrs. Harry Whiting
description: Baccarat butterfly, ring red and white set ups alternating red and green and white set up; star base; butterfly with deep purple body, blue eyes and varying colored wings of red, blue yellow, etc, surrounded by a ring of red centered white set ups alternating with red, white and green edged set ups; large weight with star cut on bottom
title: Paperweight
